snippet: General Motors and France's PSA Group will hold a press conference on Monday morning, they said on Saturday, with the subject expected to be the acquisition of the U.S. carmaker's loss-making Opel unit....

headline.main: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports
headline.print_headline: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports

lead_paragraph: General Motors and France's PSA Group will hold a press conference on Monday morning, they said on Saturday, with the subject expected to be the acquisition of the U.S. carmaker's loss-making Opel unit.
